core_rules: Use useGSAP hook for all GSAP animations to handle cleanup.
Use gsap.set() for initial states to avoid FOUC.
Always use transform: translate() (x/y) instead of top/left for performance.
optimization: Implement will-change: transform on heavily animated elements.
Use GSAP Snap for discrete values.
Batch animations where possible using gsap.timeline().

core_rules: Use layoutId for shared element transitions.
Use variants to keep animation logic clean and reusable.
optimization: Minimize the number of motion elements on screen simultaneously.

AI_IDE_SPECIFICS.Cursor: Assume the user is using Cursor's Composer. Provide clean, modular code that is easy for the AI to parse and refactor. Use the latest best practices for GSAP 3.12+ and React 18/19.
AI_IDE_SPECIFICS.Windsurf: Focus on step-by-step implementation for Flow. Ensure all code blocks are complete and context-aware.
AI_IDE_SPECIFICS.VSCode: Standard modular React patterns with clear comments and JSDoc for IDE intellisense.
